title: Broccoli with chilli and garlic oil

default: 1 small head broccoli, cut into florets
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Place the broccoli florets into a pan of boiling salted water and boil for four minutes. Drain well.
Heat the olive oil in a wok, add the chilli and garlic and stir fry for one minute. Add the broccoli and stir.
Season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper, then spoon into a serving dish. Serve immediately.
